mapper.select: select no, desertionNo, filename, happenDt, happenPlace, kindCd, colorCd, age, weight, noticeNo, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, popfile, processState, sexCd, neuterYn, specialMark, careNm, careTel, careAddr, orgNm, chargeNm, officetel as officeTel from dataset where no = #{no}

select q.no, desertionNo, filename, happenDt, happenPlace, kindCd, colorCd, age, weight, noticeNo, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, popfile, processState, sexCd, neuterYn, specialMark, careNm, careTel, careAddr, orgNm, chargeNm, officetel as officeTel from ( select no from ffp.dataset WHERE noticeEdt >= #{sdt} and processState = '보호중' limit #{limit} offset #{offset} ) q join ffp.dataset d on q.no = d.no

select no, desertionNo, filename, happenDt, happenPlace, kindCd, colorCd, age, weight, noticeNo, noticeSdt, noticeEdt, popfile, processState, sexCd, neuterYn, specialMark, careNm, careTel, careAddr, orgNm, chargeNm, officetel from dataset where processState = #{processState} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6
select kindCd from dataset WHERE kindCd like CONCAT('%',#{kindCd},'%') group by kindCd
